property.title: Summary property details
property.description: Return the summary details about a property

_id.description: The unique id (full property name - {domain}:{property name}:{range}) for this property

_created.description: The (unix timestamp) date value on which this conceptual model was created

property_name.description: The main (but not unique) identifier (name) for a property

asserted_domain_name.description: The concept against which the property was originally defined.

domain_name.description: The domain (concept) name to which a property applies

range_name.description: The range (concept) name by which a property is restricted

property_type.description: The property type indicating whether the range is a value (datatype) or concept (object).

meta_instance.description: The automatically created meta-model instance that corresponds to this property.
